description: Manage the health details of the vault.

commands.name: az site-recovery vault health refresh-default
commands.summary: Refresh default for the health of the vault.
commands.syntax:
az site-recovery vault health refresh-default [--ids]
                                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                              [--resource-group]
                                              [--subscription]
                                              [--vault-name]
examples: az site-recovery vault health refresh-default -g rg --vault-name vault_name

commands.name: az site-recovery vault health show
commands.summary: Get the health details of the vault.
examples: az site-recovery vault health show -g rg --vault-name vault_name
